ModMetaData.name: AutopsyTable (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: bodlosh
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/buuPQel.png[/img] Update of bodloshs mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1495723533
- Added Russian translation, by jose - There are now two different autopsies, normal that only gives organs/bionics and no butcher debuff, brutal that also gives skin/flesh but also a butchering debuff
[img]https://i.imgur.com/pufA0kM.png[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://invite.gg/Mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/AutopsyTable][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img]
Remove organs and bionics from corpses. Factors that influence the success chance: - doctor skill of the worker - corpse age (after 24 hours it is almost impossible to succeed) - room surgery success chance and infection chance - quality and material of the table (silver!)
[img]https://i.imgur.com/PwoNOj4.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [/list]
